org.netbeans.spi.debugger.ui

Class CodeEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.spi.debugger.ui.CodeEvaluator

  • public final class CodeEvaluator
extends Object
    Code evaluator UI. Use this to access and manage a component for code evaluations and handle it's result.
    Since:
    2.49

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CodeEvaluator.DefaultExpressionsHistoryPersistence
      Default implementation of expressions history persistence.
      static class  CodeEvaluator.EvaluatorService
      Service handling evaluations in the code evaluator.
      static class  CodeEvaluator.Result<R,H>
      A helper class managing the evaluator result.
